channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- UAA Release (OSS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- UAA Release (OSS)

item.title: CVE-2019-11279|2024-09-17T02:36:57.958Z -- cloud%20foundry -- uaa%20release%20%28oss%29
item.description: CF UAA versions prior to 74.1.0 can request scopes for a client that shouldn't be allowed by submitting an array of requested scopes. A remote malicious user can escalate their own privileges to any scope, allowing them to take control of UAA and the resources it controls.
